The '''foundation block''' is a block used to build large symmetrical buildings.

== Usage ==
* Foundation blocks measure distances to other foundation blocks.

== Behavior ==
* When equipped, measures distance to other [[:File:0.975_Screenshot-1.png|foundation blocks]] in 3D dimensional space.
* Can only be used when in build modes where the player has outlined box shown.

== Availability ==
* Block can be found in [[Creative inventory]]. Only teachers can see this block in their [[inventory]].
* Can also be given in [[Teacher menu#Give|Teacher menu "give"]] section.
* Can be distributed by console command or with a [[command block]].
